channel.title: Can someone help me? If someone can help me ill host a server alamsot 24/7
channel.description: Alright I hosted a private server on my computer before when a friend helped me and I alawys had it online except for 1 day out of the week. Now if someone can help me do it again (Dih dih derr I forgot how :( Now doesnt that just suck?) Ill host it all the time, I have time to add things to the server as well. Plus i wouldnt mind deleting some non needed filed on my pc to add stuff and let more players on the server, If you would mind helping me i will be on msn ALL Day seekereb@hotmail.com is my msn, Please help me if you can. I can explain more on my situation, I followed the instructions on the forums but i had some issues through the thing. For the most part i can do everythign except host the server on moparscape... ya... Im not gona check this or atleast not often so im me if u can plz... sorry for posting this i bet you dont want to deal with me
